sect1.title: GUI options
sect1.para: These options control the look and feel of darktable.

sect4.title: width of the side panels in pixels
sect4.para: This controls the size of side panels in pixels. Side panels are found left and right to the center view (default 300).

sect4.title: don't use embedded preview jpeg but half-size raw
sect4.para: Check this option to not use the embedded jpeg from the raw file but process the raw data. This is slower but gives you color managed thumbnails (default off).

sect4.title: ask before removing images from database
sect4.para: Always ask the user before any image is removed from the database (default on).

sect4.title: ask before erasing images from disk
sect4.para: Always ask the user before any image file is deleted (default on).

sect4.title: ask before moving images from film roll folder
sect4.para: Always ask the user before any image file is moved (default on).

sect4.title: ask before copying images to new film roll folder
sect4.para: Always ask the user before any image file is copied (default on).

sect4.title: number of folder levels to show in lists
sect4.para: The number of folder levels to show in film roll names, starting from the right (default 1).

sect4.title: ignore jpeg images when importing film rolls
sect4.para: When having RAW+JPEG images together in one directory it makes no sense to import both. With this flag one can ignore all jpegs found (default off).

sect4.title: recursive directory traversal when importing film rolls
sect4.para: Not only import images from the directory selected but recursively go through all subdirectories as well (default off).

sect4.title: creator to be applied when importing
sect4.para: If provided, automatically add this string as a creator tag when importing images (default none).

sect4.title: publisher to be applied when importing
sect4.para: If provided, automatically add this string as a publisher tag when importing images (default none).

sect4.title: rights to be applied when importing
sect4.para: If provided, automatically add this string as a copyrights tag when importing images (default none).

sect4.title: comma separated tags to be applied when importing
sect4.para: If you want to add further tags when importing images, you can give them as a comma separated list (default none).

sect4.title: initial import rating
sect4.para: Initial star rating (from 0 to 5) for all images when importing a film roll (default 1).

sect4.title: enable filmstrip
sect4.para: Enable the filmstrip in darkroom, tethering and geomapping modes (default on).

sect4.title: maximum width of image drawing area
sect4.para: Maximum width of the image drawing area in darkroom mode - adjust to your screen. Needs a restart and will invalidate current thumbnail caches (default 1300).

sect4.title: maximum height of image drawing area
sect4.para: Maximum height of the image drawing area in darkroom mode - adjust to your screen. Needs a restart and will invalidate current thumbnail caches (default 1000).

sect4.title: compression of thumbnail images
sect4.para: Controls the compression of thumbnail images in memory and on disk. Options: off, low quality (fast), high quality (slow); (default off).

sect4.title: pen pressure control for brush masks
sect4.para: Controls how the pressure reading of a graphics tablet impacts newly generated brush strokes (see ). You can control the brush width, its hardness and its opacity. Absolute control means that the pressure reading directly defines the attribute with a value between 0% and 100%. Relative means that the pressure reading adjusts the attribute between zero and the pre-defined default value (default off).

sect4.title: ask before deleting a tag
sect4.para: Always ask user before deleting a tag from an image (default on).

sect4.title: maximum number of images drawn on map
sect4.para: The maximum number of geotagged images drawn on the map. Increasing this number can slow down the drawing of the map. Needs a restart if changed (default 100).

sect4.title: pretty print the image location
sect4.para: Show a more readable representation of the geo location in the image information module (default on).

sect4.title: expand a single lighttable module at a time
sect4.para: Controls how lighttable panels are expanded. If this option is enabled, expanding a panel by clicking collapses any currently expanded panel. If you want to expand a panel without collapsing the others you do so with shift+click. Disabling this option reverts the meaning of click and shift+click (default off).

sect4.title: expand a single darkroom module at a time
sect4.para: Controls how darkroom modules are expanded. If this option is enabled, expanding a module by clicking collapses any currently expanded module. If you want to expand a module without collapsing the others you do so with shift+click. Disabling this option reverts the meaning of click and shift+click (default on).
